title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck
title_original: KVSS Women's 100% Pure Cashmere Cardigan Sweaters V Neck Machine Washable Button Up Sweater Cardigan Long Sleeve for Winter

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and stylish
items.body: Great looking, very comfortable, light weight sweater. Very soft material if you're wearing it as a shirt, which I do. Black, so goes with everything. Great value. Read more
items.author: Robert & Linda Restivo

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Luxury in a button-up. Cashmere Cardigan
items.body: This cardigan is buttery soft and surprisingly machine washable! It’s my new go-to for layering at the office or cozying up at home. Very soft to the touch and feel. Read more
items.author: Marisa

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Somewhat Disappointing
items.body: This is a nice sweater, although not nearly as soft as I expected for cashmere. Particularly at the price point, I expected something extremely luxurious and would have to say this is just ok and feels more like regular wool. The fit is as expected, and it seems well made although, again, not particularly impressive for the price. Would not recommend unless it were heavily discounted. Read more
items.author: Skip

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Luxuriously Soft and Surprisingly Practical
items.body: This cardigan feels incredibly soft and luxurious right out of the package, exactly what you hope for with pure cashmere. It has a beautiful drape that is lightweight yet surprisingly warm, making it a perfect layering piece for the cooler weather. The v neck cut is very flattering, and the fit is classic, not too tight or too baggy. I was a bit skeptical about it being machine washable, but I followed the instructions and it came out beautifully, with no shrinking or pilling. The buttons are stitched on securely, and the ribbing on the cuffs and hem is well made. This is a truly high quality sweater that combines the elegance of cashmere with everyday convenience. Read more
items.author: Michelle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, pretty and a perfect fit
items.body: This cardigan is exactly what I was looking for as the weather cools down. The 100% cashmere is incredibly soft with absolutely no itchiness, and it's warm without being bulky. The fit is classic and flattering; it layers beautifully over a blouse for work or a t-shirt on the weekend. The V-neck is a good depth, and the sweater hits right at the hip. The best feature is that it's machine washable. I was hesitant, but I followed the care instructions, and it came out perfectly with no issues. I found it to be true to size. A very high-quality sweater that has become a staple in my wardrobe. Read more
items.author: Smart Shopper

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stunning material just runs large
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Really soft, I did the burn test and as long as the thread they provided it’s the same as the sweater - it seems it is real deal. A beautiful piece, nicely packed and precisely finished. A little oversized. But overall fit is forgiving regardless of the size you get. Hand washed it, color did not bleed. For reference I am 5’9 and 32DD (natural), 26 waist and 37 hips. Could have gotten S but got M. Read more
items.author: Joyful

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice fitting sweater.
items.body: My wife loves how well this cashmere cardigan sweater fits. It is made very well and all the seams are well sewn and even. The buttons are easy to fasten and they stay buttoned. Even with wearing for a longer period of time, the sweater is still comfortable and it looks nice. We would recommend this cashmere sweater. Read more
items.author: pinnerman08

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Taibai, Navy, Otter, Celadon, Black, Slate. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
